title: SpatialVID: A Large-Scale Video Dataset with Spatial Annotations
summary: This paper introduces SpatialVID, a large-scale video dataset with spatial annotations, addressing the limitations of existing datasets in terms of scale, diversity, and annotation richness for real-world dynamic scenes with ground-truth camera motion. It aims to advance spatial intelligence and world exploration.
